title: Person With White Cane Facing Right

verbs: Depicts walking with the aid of a white cane, indicating motion or navigation.
nouns: A person using a white cane to assist with navigation, facing to the right.

description: A person walking toward the right while holding a white cane, symbolizing visual impairment or accessibility. Often represents independence, awareness of disability inclusion, or movement with assistance.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with white cane facing right emoji shows a human figure walking toward the right using a white cane for guidance. The design emphasizes accessibility and mobility, symbolizing independence and inclusion for visually impaired individuals.
